attributes.action: Campaign for Grasmere to Ambleside Road Cycleway
attributes.additional_details:
We have been allocated 4.89 million pounds to this area through Go-lakes headed by David Robinson at the Lake District National Park.
We the people who live in this area would like some of this money allocated to giving us a Cycleway from Grasmere to Ambleside,  as can be found in most parts of Europe.
I have set up a Facebook page called " Campaign for Grasmere to Ambleside Road Cycleway"
Please join us on the page as this is a dangerous, busy part of the a 591 which is the main artery for traffic through the English Lake District National Park.
